title: Button
description: A fully customizable, theme-aware button component with multiple variants and sizes, perfect for modern web applications. Ideal for developers looking for flexible UI elements in both light and dark modes.

body.raw:
# Button Component Documentation The **Button** component is a fully customizable button that supports multiple variants and size options. It is designed for modern, theme-aware applications that use CSS variables (defined in your global CSS) for light and dark modes. ## Preview and Code Snippet console.log("Tab clicked:", value)}> Preview Code
```tsx import React from "react"; import { Button } from "@/components/button"; export default function Example() { return (
); } ``` ## Props | Prop | Type | Default | Description | | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | | `variant` | `"primary" \| "secondary" \| "outline" \| "none"` | `"outline"` | Defines the button style variant. Uses theme-aware CSS variables. | | `size` | `"xs" \| "sm" \| "md" \| "lg" \| "xl"` | `"sm"` | Controls the size of the button (affecting padding, font-size). | | `...props` | `React.ButtonHTMLAttributes` | â€“ | Supports all standard button attributes. |
